t: Amazon Fashion President Cathy Beaudoin steps down after 8 years
s: May 5, 2017 - During Beaudoin's tenure, Amazon launched seven fashion labels, in addition to offering other affordable, contemporary and high-end fashion brands, and recently launched the Amazon Echo Look that gives a second opinion on an outfit through full-length photos and videos.

t: Amazon Fashion President Cathy Beaudoin Exits | BoF
s: September 26, 2024 - BoF has learned that Cathy Beaudoin has exited Amazon Fashion, having led the juggernaut’s foray into fashion after onboarding thousands of brands and overseeing the launch of Amazon’s Williamsburg studio.

t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads

t: Amazon Ads Launches Brand+, A Way For Marketers To Leverage Shopping, Browsing And Streaming Data From Amazon’s Total Footprint
